title: Software engineer
description:
Designs, develops, tests, and maintains software applications and systems.
Collaborates with cross-functional teams to understand user needs and technical requirements.
Writes clean, efficient, and scalable code using programming languages like Java, Python, or C++.
Troubleshoots and debugs software issues to ensure optimal performance.
Continuously updates skills to keep up with evolving technologies and industry trends.
requirements:
Educational Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field.

Some roles may accept equivalent experience or certifications.

💻 Technical Skills

Proficiency in programming languages like Python, Java, C++, or JavaScript.

Knowledge of data structures, algorithms, and software development methodologies.

Experience with databases, version control (e.g., Git), and debugging tools.

🛠️ Soft Skills

Strong problem-solving and analytical thinking.

Good communication and teamwork abilities.

Adaptability and willingness to learn new technologies.

📁 Experience & Certifications (Optional but Valuable)
Internships, personal projects, or contributions to open-source.
Certifications like AWS, Microsoft Azure, or Google Cloud for cloud roles.
Would you like a checklist format or tailored requirements for a specific type of software engineering role (e.g., front-end, back-end, full-stack)?

title: Software engineering
requirements:
I need full stack developer.
With react and node JS
